intro: The Vior'la Tau army list lets you field a Tau army from the Vior'la Sept. The Vior'la is focused on the larger Tau Battlesuits, with support options largely restricted to other suits, and drones.
strategy: Tau armies have a Strategy Rating of 3.
Initiative: XV8 Crisis Battlesuit, XV10 Heavy Battlesuit Cadres, KV128 Stormsurge, and KX139 Supremacy Armour have an Initiative Rating of 1+. All other formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+.

formations.name: XV8 Crisis Battlesuit Cadre
formations.units: One Shas'el, Six XV8 Crisis Battlesuits

formations.name: Heavy Battlesuit Cadre
formations.units: One Shas'el and Three XV104 Riptide Battlesuits, three XV107 R'Varna Battlesuits or three XV109 Y'Vahra Battlesuits

sections.name: Vior'la Support Formations
sections.description: Up to two for each Vior'la Core Formation taken

formations.name: Fire Warrior Strike Group
formations.units: Eight Fire Warriors, or six Fire Warriors and three Devilfish

formations.name: Drone Group
extraUnits: Replace two Gun Drones with two Missile Drones or two Shield Drones (Free), or two Marker Drones (25 points)

formations.name: Stealth Group
extraUnits: Replace three XV15 Stealth Battlesuits with three XV95 Ghostkeel Battlesuits: 75 points

sections.name: Vior'la War Engines & Air Caste Formations
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on these formations.

formations.name: KV128 Stormsurge Suit
formations.units: One KV128 Stormsurge Ballistic Suit (Standard or Support Configuration)

formations.name: KX139 Supremacy Armour
formations.units: One Shas'el, one KX139 Ta'unar Supremacy Armour

formations.name: Tiger Shark Squadron
extraUnits: Add six Gun Drones or six Missile Drones: 75 points

formations.name: 0–1 Spacecraft
extraUnits: Replace the Protector with a Custodian Class Battleship: 25 points

upgrades.title: Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once by a formation

items.name: 0–1 Shas'o
items.description: Replace one Shas'el character with a Shas'o character

items.name: Drones
items.description: Add any one of the following upgrades to the formation

options.description: Two Gun Drones, Missile Drones or Shield Drones

items.name: Heavy Battlesuits
items.description: Add up to two XV104 Riptide Battlesuits, XV107 R'Varna Battlesuits, or XV109 Y'Vahra Battlesuits (the formation may not contain a mix of Heavy Battlesuits)
